colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006B (CES RTA GA-YANG 'GUGS CHOG 'DI NI YUL MI RNAMS RTA'I GA-YANG SHIN TU NYAMS NAS NYAM THAG LA BYAMS PA'I SEMS KYI KUN NAS BSLANGS TE THA SHAL SMYONG PA'I SPYOD YUL CAN, SU MA TI KARMA'I MING CAN SLOB DPON CHEN PO PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS KYI GA-YANG KHUG SOGS LA GZHIR BYAS NAS 'PHRAL DU BRIS PA'O, ,'DI LA NOR 'KHRUL BYUNG NA MKHAS PA RNAMS LA 'CHAGS SO, ,BDAG LA SGRIB PA MI 'BYUNG BAR MDZAD DU GSOL, LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD YOD NA DGE BAS 'GRO KUN DBUL BA'I SDUL BSNGAL DANG BRAL NAS MYUR DU DAG PA'I ZHING KHAMS SU SKYE BAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
